nodes.excerpt: Use https://pudding.ai/ for real-time ad creative analysis to maximize your campaign ROI and work efficiency. Get actionable, data-driven AI insights 💡 for all your ad creatives and bridge the gap by ensuring great communication between your creative & media teams.
nodes.title: Pudding.ai - Real-time feedback for your ad creatives
nodes.author: Dina Taitelbaum

localize.description: 使用https://pudding.ai/，进行实时广告创意分析，以最大限度地提高您的广告活动投资回报率和工作效率。为您的所有广告创意获取可操作的、数据驱动的AI洞察力💡，并通过确保您的创意和媒体团队之间的巨大沟通来弥补差距。
localize.tagline: 为您的广告创意提供实时反馈

localize.tagline: 爲您的廣告創意提供實時反饋

nodes.excerpt: Pickle helps companies understand every phone and video conversation they have with their customers. We do this by automatically transcribing calls and extracting key insights, questions, and trends.
nodes.title: Pickle - Transcribe and analyze phone and video conversations
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Pickle帮助企业了解他们与客户的每一次电话和视频对话。我们通过自动转录电话并提取关键见解、问题和趋势来实现这一目标。
localize.tagline: 抄录和分析电话和视频对话。

localize.description: Pickle幫助企業瞭解他們與客戶的每一次電話和視頻對話。我們通過自動轉錄電話並提取關鍵見解、問題和趨勢來實現這一目標。
localize.tagline: 抄錄和分析電話和視頻對話。

nodes.excerpt: Threadletter allows converting a Revue newsletter to a Twitter thread in seconds. Enter the Revue API key, select the issue, and publish the thread via Chirr App or copy-paste to Twitter.
nodes.title: Threadletter - Convert Revue newsletter to Twitter thread in seconds
nodes.author: Sasha Koss

localize.description: Threadletter允许在几秒钟内将Revue通讯转换为Twitter主题。输入Revue的API密钥，选择问题，并通过Chirr App或复制粘贴到Twitter发布线程。
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内将Revue通讯转换为Twitter线程

localize.description: Threadletter允許在幾秒鐘內將Revue通訊轉換爲Twitter主題。輸入Revue的API密鑰，選擇問題，並通過Chirr App或複製粘貼到Twitter發佈線程。
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將Revue通訊轉換爲Twitter線程

nodes.excerpt: Instantly create a mockup for any website. Paste the page URL and instantly generate a wireframe image of the site or your favorite websites in full-page resolution (3000 x 2000 pixels) with the background color of your choice.
nodes.title: webshot - Instantly create a mockup for any website
nodes.author: bereket

localize.description: 即时为任何网站创建一个模拟图。粘贴页面URL，并立即生成网站或您最喜爱的网站的线框图像，全页分辨率（3000 x 2000像素），背景颜色由您选择。
localize.tagline: 即时为任何网站创建一个模拟图。

localize.description: 即時爲任何網站創建一個模擬圖。粘貼頁面URL，並立即生成網站或您最喜愛的網站的線框圖像，全頁分辨率（3000 x 2000像素），背景顏色由您選擇。
localize.tagline: 即時爲任何網站創建一個模擬圖。

nodes.excerpt: Wyndly gives people with allergies lifelong relief. We ship you personalized oral allergy drops that train your immune system to beat your personal allergy triggers. With unlimited doctor access and at-home care, we’ve made allergy care convenient.
nodes.title: Wyndly - Train your immune system to beat your allergies
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Wyndly让过敏症患者得到终生缓解。我们为您运送个性化的口服过敏滴剂，训练您的免疫系统来击败您个人的过敏触发器。通过无限制的医生访问和上门护理，我们让过敏护理变得更加方便。
localize.tagline: 训练您的免疫系统以击败您的过敏症

localize.tagline: 訓練您的免疫系統以擊敗您的過敏症

nodes.excerpt: The way we build and use products is changing faster than ever before. To succeed, it’s essential to know what’s coming next. We surveyed thousands of Product leaders to distill the most important trends and insights you need to know as we enter 2021. Enjoy!
nodes.title: Future of Product Management Report 2021 - This is the best time in history to build digital products🚀
nodes.author: Farbod Saraf

localize.description: 我们构建和使用产品的方式比以往任何时候都要快。要想获得成功，就必须了解下一步的发展方向。我们调查了数千名产品领导者，提炼出进入2021年后您需要了解的最重要趋势和见解。请欣赏
localize.tagline: 这是历史上打造数字产品的最好时机🚀。

localize.tagline: 這是歷史上打造數字產品的最好時機🚀。

nodes.excerpt: PowerFarm platform lets run and orchestrate your Selenium and mobile tests on the cloud. It monitors results quickly and thoroughly and ensures smooth integration with repositories or other platforms. Learn more by joining our early access program.
nodes.title: PowerFarm - Orchestrate and manage your tests in the cloud.
nodes.author: Wojtek Smajda

localize.description: PowerFarm平台可以让您在云端运行和协调Selenium和移动测试。它可以快速、彻底地监控结果，并确保与存储库或其他平台顺利集成。通过加入我们的早期访问计划了解更多信息。
localize.tagline: 在云端协调和管理您的测试。

localize.description: PowerFarm平臺可以讓您在雲端運行和協調Selenium和移動測試。它可以快速、徹底地監控結果，並確保與存儲庫或其他平臺順利集成。通過加入我們的早期訪問計劃瞭解更多信息。
localize.tagline: 在雲端協調和管理您的測試。

nodes.excerpt: Coverr is a resource for beautiful free and exclusive stock videos for commercial and non-commercial use, no attribution required. This should be your go-to destination when searching a video for your next project.
nodes.title: Coverr 3.0 - Free stock videos for creators. No attribution required.
nodes.author: Ben Lang

localize.description: Coverr是一个美丽的免费和独家的库存视频资源，用于商业和非商业用途，不需要注明来源。当您为您的下一个项目搜索视频时，这里应该是您的首选之地。
localize.tagline: 免费库存视频为创作者。无需归属。

localize.description: Coverr是一個美麗的免費和獨家的庫存視頻資源，用於商業和非商業用途，不需要註明來源。當您爲您的下一個項目搜索視頻時，這裏應該是您的首選之地。
localize.tagline: 免費庫存視頻爲創作者。無需歸屬。

nodes.excerpt: Covalent helps remote teams build better bonds through interactive, online icebreakers. Getting started is easy: (1) Find a friend and visit our website (2) Press on "Start Bonding" in the top, right-hand corner (3) Press "Host" then "Play"
nodes.title: Covalent - Interactive icebreakers for remote teams
nodes.author: Arek Der-Sarkissian

localize.description: Covalent通过互动式在线破冰，帮助远程团队建立更好的联系。开始很简单：(1)找到一位朋友并访问我们的网站(2)按右上角的 "开始连接"(3)按 "主机 "然后按 "播放"。
localize.tagline: 远程团队的互动破冰

localize.description: Covalent通過互動式在線破冰，幫助遠程團隊建立更好的聯繫。開始很簡單：(1)找到一位朋友並訪問我們的網站(2)按右上角的 "開始連接"(3)按 "主機 "然後按 "播放"。
localize.tagline: 遠程團隊的互動破冰

nodes.excerpt: PowerRouter is a powerful and easy way to route sales leads to the right salesperson in Salesforce with smart rules you setup in advance. You can build lead/contact distribution rules 10x faster without writing any code.
nodes.title: PowerRouter - Route your Salesforce leads 10x faster
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: PowerRouter是一种强大而简单的方法，可以通过您事先设置的智能规则将销售线索路由到Salesforce中的正确销售人员。您可以在不编写任何代码的情况下，以10倍的速度建立销售线索/联系人分配规则。
localize.tagline: 将您的Salesforce销售线索路由速度提高10倍

localize.description: PowerRouter是一種強大而簡單的方法，可以通過您事先設置的智能規則將銷售線索路由到Salesforce中的正確銷售人員。您可以在不編寫任何代碼的情況下，以10倍的速度建立銷售線索/聯繫人分配規則。
localize.tagline: 將您的Salesforce銷售線索路由速度提高10倍
